subtitle: Serve these savoury scones at tea time with butter, or for lunch with a selection of cold meats, cheeses and salads.

method.text: Sift together the flour and baking powder and season. Rub in margarine until mixture resembles fine breadcrumbs. Add cheese and sesame seeds. Make a well in the centre, pour in the oil, then gradually add sufficient milk to make a soft dough.
Knead on a lightly floured surface. Roll out to 2 cm in thickness and cut into 6cm rounds.
Place on a lightly greased baking tray. Bake in the oven for 12-15 min or until firm. Transfer to a wire cooling tray. Split in half to serve.

title: Sesame cheese scones
